Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler’s side can sit back and relax now whilst others battle it out for a place in the final four.
USA captain Aaron Jones looked bitterly disappointed as he spoke with Michael Atherton after the match.
Jones also reflected on the whole World Cup campaign saying, 'This is our first World Cup and a lot of people didn’t think we would be here playing the big boys. But we did it.'
Buttler praised his team’s performance saying, 'We played exceptionally well. We set the tone and to restrict them to 115, we were very pleased.'

Adil Rashid was named player of the match and highlighted Chris Jordan's performance saying, 'CJ is a match-winner. He’s been doing it for a number of years. He’s been vital and he’s showed us that again today.'
